title: How immunotherapy may be effective for fighting tuberculosis

title_detail.value: How immunotherapy may be effective for fighting tuberculosis

summary: New research suggests that structures released by infected cells in tuberculosis may be used in tandem with antibiotics to boost the body's immune system, helping fight off the disease.

summary_detail.value: New research suggests that structures released by infected cells in tuberculosis may be used in tandem with antibiotics to boost the body's immune system, helping fight off the disease.
